english.segment1: Into Your hands. I commit again. With all I am, for You, Lord. You hold my world. In the palm of Your hand. And I am Yours forever
english.segment2: Jesus I believe in You. Jesus I belong to You. Youre the reason that I live. The reason that I sing. With all I am
english.segment3: Ill walk with You. Wherever You go. Through tears and joy. Ill trust in You. And I will live. In all of Your ways. And Your promises, forever
english.segment4: I will worship. I will worship You
